attributes.action: Enforce energy control and consumption labelling on all brown goods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A simple circuit could be applied by law to all TVs, DVDs and Plasma screens etc. to ensure that when in standby mode, their electricity usage is practically zero. Further, just like fridges and freezers, let's increase the motivation for manufacturers of brown goods to produce energy efficient items by marking them with the alphabetic efficiency colour code.
